BuffData.DynamicTooltip:
OathswornWhen Kalista and her Oathsworn both basic attack the same target within 1.5 seconds, she deals @f1@% of their max health as magic damage. 8 second cooldown per target.

Kalista's ultimate will pull the Oathsworn to her. Then, when the Oathsworn clicks any mouse button, they will fly out in a direction, knocking up the first enemy champion struck.Source: @SourceName@
